rows.label: qst101603_msg0001
rows.name:
'One is in the hermit's belly.'...
Hmm... What does that mean...?

rows.label: qst101603_msg0002
rows.name:
You beat me to it! Tch...
How frustrating!!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0003
rows.name: A strangely shaped part? May I see it?

rows.label: qst101603_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait... This looks a lot
like my grandpa's treasure!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0005
rows.name:
So it is... So that's what
those words meant...!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0006
rows.name:
The words my grandfather often
said about the treasure...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0007
rows.name:
'When the fragments of three
and three gather, the hero's
treasure shall be bestowed.'

rows.label: qst101603_msg0008
rows.name:
Parts very similar to my
grandfather's treasure, three
and three, for a total of six...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0009
rows.name:
There might be four more
somewhere in Alst!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0010
rows.name:
This is no time to be impressed,
is it? This is a competition
between me and you!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0011
rows.name:
Who will be the first to
find a mural like this one
and solve the mystery...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0012
rows.name: and obtain the remaining four parts...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0013
rows.name:
When we find them,
let's meet back here!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0014
rows.name:
And after we obtain them, let's
witness together what happens next!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0015
rows.name:
Well then... I look forward
to seeing you again!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0201
rows.name: You've come...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0203
rows.name:
I don't need you to tell me.
You beat me to all of them.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0204
rows.name:
...My grandfather got this
treasure through salvaging.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0205
rows.name:
It's from the sunken Divine
Beast, Iira... apparently.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0206
rows.name:
He dived to a depth that
even skilled salvagers find
difficult and got it.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0207
rows.name:
But the strain was too much for
my grandfather, and he died...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0208
rows.name:
'When the fragments of three
and three gather, the hero's
treasure shall be bestowed.'

rows.label: qst101603_msg0209
rows.name:
This was written on the box
that contained the part.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0210
rows.name:
My grandfather left me with the task
of finding the remaining five...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0211
rows.name:
But I couldn't find all five!
Having just one is meaningless!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0212
rows.name:
Let's fight one more time,
betting the parts we each found!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0213
rows.name:
If I win... I'll take
all five of those!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0214
rows.name:
This is my and my
grandfather's destiny!!
